product_name: Speck Durafolio Tablet Case - iPad Mini Retina
long_description: The slim, protective and versatile Speck Durafolio Tablet Case offers military-grade protection for your iPad Mini Retina, with a dual-layer design that delivers unsurpassed impact protection. Slim profile and durable, textured finish; mighty construction with reinforced textured grip. Magnetic cover helps protect your screen while in the closed position. Magnet turns iPad on and off automatically for sleep/wake functionality. Versatile folio allows multiple viewing angles, plus an integrated typing mode. The Speck Durafolio Tablet Case features seamless construction with fluid lines and layered construction.
short_description: The slim, protective and versatile Speck Durafolio Tablet Case offers military-grade protection for your iPad Mini Retina, with a dual-layer design that delivers unsurpassed impact protection.
